title: After URF, ARURF and snow ARURF: URF
body:
Yeah, this is my prediction for next urf equivalent :
the infamous UDYR RAPID FIRE,
your cooldowns are lowered , everything as ultra rapid fire, but you only play udyr.

that way you don't complain about not knowing what champion you will play or even complain about champion diversity.

now , you play udyr , with a little more attack speed and no mana, must be SOOOOOO fun right ?

replies.body: I DnT wAnt tO bE fOrCed In/to a metA REEEEEEE{{champion:48}}
